name: Tukui
summary: Minimalistic and lightweight world of warcraft user interface

name: AlhanaUI
summary: AlhanaUI is an external Tukui edit that adds additional features and function to the existing Tukui.

name: AlhanaUI - The ElvUI Edit
summary: AlhanaUI - The ElvUI Edit is simply the Tukui version in ElvUI format.

name: AlhanaUISexyMap
summary: Allows the use of the SexyMap minimap addon in conjunction with AlhanaUI or Tukui

name: Altoholic Count Hider
summary: This little addon makes tooltip lines with item counts disappear on items of your choice (Hearthstones are in there by default).

name: AlysiaUI
summary: clean and modern UI with Tank/DPS and Heal Layout. transparent and Classcolor Themes are available.

name: Arcane_UI
summary: An minimalistic ElvUI mod.

name: Auto Keystone
summary: Insert keystones into the Font of Power automatically

name: BC Solutions
summary: Various additional features for ElvUI.

name: BenikUI - The ElvUI edit
summary: BenikUI is an external ElvUI mod, adding different frame style and new features like detatched portraits and dashboards.

name: BGE Spec and Class
summary: Adds a spec/class string to BattleGroundEnemies frames and a custom tag so the same information can be added to enemy nameplates.

name: Bigger Action Buttons
summary: Allow you to go over the default max size of buttons (60) in action bars, pet bar, stance bar and micro bar.

name: Buff Highlight
summary: Lighweight plugin for to ElvUI that allows to highlight unit frames when a specific buff is on the unit.

name: Call to Arms
summary: Display active Call to Arms bonuses

name: Cecile_MeterOverlay
summary: display any damage meter as overlay in a configurable data text

name: Chat Box Fader
summary: Fades the chat box when conditions are met.

name: CopyPasta2
summary: CopyPasta2 is a small utility that enables multi-line/unlimited-length pasting of text or commands into WoW.

name: DecUI
summary: DecUI - Shadowlands

name: DejaCharacterStats
summary: Dejablue's restored and improved character stats frame display.

name: DiceUI
summary: DiceUI is an external ElvUI mod with a clean and ultra minimal interface.

name: DSM (Dajova's Shared Media)
summary: Small collection of shared media to insert to Elvui or any other UI.

name: Dynamic Status Icons
summary: Adds various status icons to ElvUI UnitFrames for Combat/Resting/Dead/Normal

name: Eltruism
summary: An ElvUI Plugin containing many features not available in ElvUI alongside DPS/Tank/Healer profiles and settings for other addons

name: ElvUI Actionbar Combat State
summary: Allows for different visibility settings in and out of combat.

name: ElvUI BC DataTexts
summary: Usefull DataTexts supporting ElvUI 11.43

name: ElvUI Cardinal Points
summary: Adds cardinal points (N. S. E. and W.) to the minimap.

name: ElvUI Chat Panel AutoHide
summary: Automatically hides the ElvUI Chat Panels when in combat.

name: ElvUI CustomMedia
summary: This custom Addon adds 14 new Fonts and 18 Textures to your ElvUI!

name: ElvUI Enhanced (Again)
summary: This is a continuation of ElvUI Enhanced and a more lite weight version. Minimap button bar and location text and cords above the map.

name: ElvUI Honor Data Text
summary: Create a data text to display honor

name: ElvUI Login Screen and Character Select
summary: Glues and Buttons to update the Login Screen and Character Select to the ElvUI Style

name: ElvUI Microbar Enhancement
summary: Plugin that adds options to ElvUI's microbar.

name: ElvUI Nuts and Bolts
summary: A compilation of useful mini addons.

name: ElvUI Progressive DataBars Colors
summary: Add some color to the DataBars!

summary: Makes unitframes of your choice be specifically colored at certain breakpoints

summary: Old Elvui:Glues Plugin

summary: This addon allows more tracking of absorbs on ElvUIs raid frames.

name: ElvUI_AP_tooltip
summary: Simple plugin for ElvUI tooltip to show AP with % on item tooltip.

name: ElvUI_Black_and_White

name: ElvUI_ColorblindHelper
summary: Cross-character settings for reaction and threat color more suitable for the colorblind.

summary: ElvUI_CustomStyleFilters provides the ability to dynamically create nameplate style filter triggers based on custom Lua conditions.
